::Zardus::

Zardus clenches his teeth as Teltoli knocks him out of the air, 
sending him plummeting toward the ground. He turns on his jetpack and 
regains his balance in the air. He lifts his comm-link to his mouth.

"Enough. Alliance, do whatever finale you were going to. We're done 
here for now." His wrist beeps. He looks down and sees the alliance 
base reporting that there was activity at the pred base.

"The predacons are probably going to attack again. They can carry on 
here. Let's go." Zardus sends the tranmission and fires several shots 
at Teltoli, waiting for the alliance to finish up.
